content:
Sure, here is a table summarizing all of your experiences from your CV:

| Role | Company | Duration | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Chief Technology Officer | ABC Company | 2019 - Present | Led the development and implementation of technology strategies, managed technology teams, and oversaw product development. |
| Senior System Engineer and Architect (Freelance) | Sindiana | 2020 - 2021 | Led PDR and CDR for software simulation project for RAFAEL. |
| Senior System Architect (Freelance) | Israel Air Force | 2021 - Present | Designed digital architecture to optimize resource allocation, analyze multi-sensor data, and support decision-making processes using ML and decision formulas. |
| Chief Technology Officer | XYZ Corporation | 2017 - 2019 | Spearheaded the development and implementation of technology strategies, managed cross-functional teams, and led product development. |
| Senior Software Engineer | LMN Technologies | 2015 - 2017 | Designed and developed software solutions for clients in various industries. |
| Software Engineer | EFG Solutions | 2013 - 2015 | Designed and implemented software solutions for clients in the finance industry. |

Note: This is just an example format and you may choose to customize it to your specific needs.
